title: JSON schema for wallet-relying party registration certificate header area

alg.description: Indicates the algorithm used to sign the JWT as defined in clause 5.1.2 of ETSI TS 119 182-1 [18].

items.description: Base64-encoded X.509 certificate in DER format.

x5c.description: Contains the whole certificate chain to verify the JWT or CWT as defined in clause 5.1.8 of ETSI TS 119 182-1 [18].
